body.name: NERNAK 12V 12Ah Lithium LiFePO4 Deep Cycle Battery, 2000+ Cycles Lithium Iron Phosphate Rechargeable Battery for Small UPS, Power Wheels, Fish Finder, Scooters and More, Built-in 12A BMS
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 9 mins

features: 【Superior Performance】: Lithium iron phosphate battery has high energy density, Long cycle life, Good safety performance, No memory effect, etc. NERMAK LiFePO4 battery has built-in BMS protection to prevent overcharge, Over-discharge, Over-current and short circuit, and very low self-discharge rate. (Not motorcycle starter battery)

【Long life & light weight】: 2000+ cycles of lithium-ion batteries are no problem, while traditional lead-acid batteries only have 200-500 cycles. The battery does not contain acid, which is safer and more environmentally friendly than lead-acid batteries. Our lithium iron phosphate battery weighs only 3.2 pounds, which is only 1/3 of the weight of a lead-acid battery.

【Widely Uses】: Widely uses in most areas such as: Emergency Light, 12V router, RV/outdoor camping, Outdoor Camping, Power wheels, ride on toys, Fish finder, Kayak, Air Pump, Small ups, Backup power, Cellular remote camera, Solar/Wind power and more...

【Expansion and Recharge】Can be connected in series or parallel, in series, Up to 4 identical batteries can be connected，Quick charge by 6A , and heavy-duty output discharge up to 12A continuous and 3C Pulse.

【Warm Note】: 1* 12 Volt Replacement lithium ion battery，12 months warranty, Dimensions (L x W x H): 5.94 x 3.81 x 3.71 inches, If you have any question for our product, Contact us: click the "Ask a question" on our storefront or in "YOUR ORDER" options click the "contact seller" (please use LiFePo4 special charger, with fully automatic SLA charger may not be fully charged)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LiFePO4 battery is a cleaner, More powerful and safer power solution LiFeP04 batteries are maintenance-free batteries, If you need them all the time, Then lead-acid becomes too unreliable and laborious, The battery's lithium-ion properties reduce the weight of traditional lead-acid batteries to less than half, While significantly improving performance and capacity, Traditional lead-acid batteries contain large amounts of lead, After disposal if not properly disposed of, Will pollute the environment, While lithium materials without any toxic or hazardous substances, Recognized by the world as a green battery, Its great durability allows you to easily use them at home and at work, Or safe outdoor needs , The environment is most important.

Battery type Lithium Ion Cycle life >2000 cycle Rated Capacity ‎12Ah (0.2C, 25°C) Voltage ‎12.8 Volts Wattage 153.6 watts Weight 3.23 LB Terminal Type F2 Charging Voltage 14.4±0.2V Dimensions (L x W x H): 5.94 x 3.81 x 3.71 inches Continue Discharge Current 12A Peak discharge current 30A (Duration: less than 5 seconds) Operating Temperature Discharging: -4°F to 140°F; Charging: 32°F to 113°F Continue Charge Current 6A

APPLICATIONS Recommend using a professional LiFePO4 charger to charge the battery so that it can be charged to its full capacity (existing lead-acid battery chargers (wet, AGM or gel) will also work fine) Lithium ion batteries can be discharged up to 100% without causing damage. Make sure to charge the battery immediately after discharge. We recommend limiting the discharge to 80-90% depth of discharge (DOD) to avoid disconnection of the battery by the BMS. 12V LiFePO4 battery have no liquid inside. This allows you to safely mount the battery where you want to place it.

Rechargeable deep cycle maintenance-free LiFeP04 battery, Which is characterized by small size and light weight, Very suitable for fish finder, 10ah capacity can continue to provide a constant source of energy, So you can easily enjoy your fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update: Li-ion batteries work great. Been 7 months....
reviews.reviewText: Updating my review to 5 stars:It turns out the batteries were not bad at all. It was a blown fuse in the battery compartment which linked all (4) batteries in series. Once I replaced the fuse the batteries all worked fine.So the repair shop I took my scooter to didn't bother opening up the battery box to examine it and just assumed all the batteries were bad since there was no power coming from the battery box.After I wrote to the company which sold me the batteries through Amazon messaging. They replied that they would refund me for the (4) batteries. I did not take them up on their refund because I wanted to test/charge each battery up individually instead of trying to charge them all through the battery box in series. They charged up fine individually. That's when I noticed a small round container with a twist off top instead the battery box. It contained a fuse. After replacing the F30A250V fuse the battery box was able to charge up all 4 batteries and plugging it into my scooter worked fine.[Original 1 star review]Purchased (4) of the Nermak 12V 12AH lithium batteries for an old electric sit on scooter. Used 3 times in 5 months and the last time I used I hit a small bump in the road and the scooter stopped working. I thought my scooter's wiring was faulty so brought it into a repair shop. They tried to charge the batteries but said they see 0 voltage coming from the batteries and recommended me to replace the batteries. The other 2 times I rode the scooter I got stranded because the batteries died. Again I thought it was a mechanical/electrical problem. But it was able to start back up after charging the batteries. Since the 30 day return policy has long passed and don't know how to contact "Nermak" since they only seem to sell through Amazon I am out of luck with getting new/working batteries to replace these duds. All 4 batteries... Wow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Saved so much $$ by purchasing these for my travel disability scooter. Much lighter than the old ones and holds a charge wonderfully.. Fit right into the housing for my Tzora scooter. I recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't hold up under load
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Can really say what went wron but they were hot when this happened

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, good value
reviews.reviewText: Batteries arrived in new condition, charge up without incident using a charger designed for LIFEPO batteries. They are sitting on the basement floor fully charged waiting for installation and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Battery failed after using about 8 times in elderly woman's scooter.
reviews.reviewText: When I first got them they did ok ( 9-30-2023). Took Grandma to Vegas for her 99th birthday (mid October) and she road around for 3 days. We got home and scooter was used once/twice per week. Went to use it last week and scooter charger showed green but scooter would not turn on. Checked charger, connections but all is OK. One battery is 12.92 volts but other is 8.87 volts. So here it is 12-07 2023 and scooter is not useable. I am sending a complaint to Amazon because I can not find any contact info for Nermak batteries on the internet. Only buy if you pay extera for the warrantee or just buy a better battery.update 12-07-2023----Had to go online to find the customer service phone number. After 2 tries with the electronic voice I finally got through to "Kajal", who help me get a partial refund. Just wish the Batteries would have work correctly the first time. Will research the batteries before I buy again. Thanks Pat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Upgrade for mobility scooter
reviews.reviewText: Replaced two heavy ES12-12 lead acid batteries with these lightweight lithium batteries. According to my dad, who operates the mobility scooter, there is definitely a performance improvement. And they should last much longer with many more charge life cycles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Battery very happy
reviews.reviewText: Great battery, light weight, well packaged. Just as pictured

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: The batteries in my mobility scooter went dead. The manufacturer of the scooter wanted $160 for replacement. After looking at different options, I chose these. When the package came, I thought I'd made a mistake as the box didn't weigh as much as one of the original lead acid batteries. I opened the box and there were indeed two batteries inside. After charging the batteries, I installed them and was very happy to see that they functioned flawlessly. Half the weight, less money... What more could you want?
